reviewText: I received this DVD promptly, and it played perfectly.  I met my expectations and I will be buying from them again.  Thank you for great service and product.
good dvd  put out by butchart
Perfect history narrative combined with beautiful footage of the Garden.  bought to take my mom to this garden she has wanted to visit.  Just the right length too!

I was pleased with the product but very surprised at the shipping costs and the time it took to get here.  I purchased this for a friend  so don't really know the quality or content of the DVD.  This is the 1st time I have purchased anything through Amazon and was quite pleased with the process.

regards,
Mary Garoni
This is a magnificent DVD that gives you the feel of actually being there.  The scenes are beautiful and the history fascinating.

The DVD is unchanged from many years ago. The quality is not keeping up with the times. But it is a great  film to review, especially if you just want to be reminded of the fabulous gardens that you once visited.  The price is very low & a fairly good value.

This video made my mother's 80th birthday very special.  She has wanted to go to Butchart Gardens for a long time but is just not feasible for her now.  This video not only gave her an opportunity to see the gardens but also gave some great history of the gardens.  She loved it and now she can go back any time and see these most interesting and beautiful gardens.

The really is a wonderful video of Butchart Gardens.  The garden is telling it, and it is presented well.  I bought the video when I visited the gardens and since have shown it at my house, before a tea I had for my aunts, and I hope to show it to my woman's group at church.....
